results.title: TET2 deficiency promotes anxiety and depression-like behaviors by activating NLRP3/IL-1beta pathway in microglia of allergic rhinitis mice
results.text_hl: This article will investigate whether @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ can improve @<m>DISEASE_Rhinitis_Allergic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D065631 @@@AR@@@ @DISEASE_Neuroinflammatory_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D000090862 @@@neuroinflammatory symptoms@@@ through TET2.

results.title: Metformin Improves Comorbid Depressive Symptoms in Mice with Allergic Rhinitis by Reducing Olfactory Bulb Damage.

results.title: Metformin attenuated depressive-like behaviors by suppressing TRPV1/NLRP3 mediated neuroinflammation in the hypothalamus of allergic rhinitis mice.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: @<m>DISEASE_Rhinitis_Allergic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D065631 @@@AR@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ exhibited significant @DISEASE_Depressive_Disorder @DISEASE_MESH:D003866 @@@depressive@@@-like behavior, which was attenuated by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@.

results.title: Spectroscopic interactions of non-insulin-dependent diabetes mellitus with levocetirizine.
results.text_hl: Hence, drug interaction between @CHEMICAL_Glyburide @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005905 @@@glibenclamide@@@ or @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ with levocetirizne occurred.
